1.content:
You're Steve, an average guy. You don't have a girlfriend, and you live alone in a small apartment. You go to school at the local college. One day, you decide to go for a walk outside your apartment building. On your way out, however, a girl calls out to you. Who is it?

Susan
Hair color: Brown
Ethnicity: White
Height: 5' 9"
Age: 32
Cup size: DD
Single, wishes she was a mother. As a result, she has taken pills to begin lactating.

Lin
Hair color: Black
Ethnicity: Japanese
Age: 22
Height: 5' 3"
Cup size: B
Goes to your college, in your physics class.

Stephanie
Hair color: Black
Ethnicity: Black
Age: 25
Height: 5' 4"
Cup size: C
Lives in the apartment next to you, has a crush on you.

Erin
Hair color: Blue(dyed)
Ethnicity: White
Age: 19
Height: 5' 6"
Cup size: F
Modest, quirky and shy. Amazing breasts but doesn't flaunt them.

Krista
Hair color: Blonde
Ethnicity: White
Age: 20
Height: 5' 5"
Cup size: D
Bisexual, has a redheaded girlfriend named Lexi. Friendly. You don't know her very well.
1.title: The Beginning

11.content:
"Hey Steve!" says Susan. She walks up to you, wearing a red dress and high heels that click as she walks.

"Hi Susan," you reply. Susan reaches out her hand to you.

"C'mere, Steve. There's something I want to show you in my apartment," she says, "You're a physics major, right?" You nod, "Great! You'll love this!" You follow Sue back to her apartment. On her counter, you notice some strange pills, probably just fitness supplements. Susan opens her closet, looks through it for a while, then returns with a strange device. It's shaped like a gun, with blinking orange and green lights on it.

"What is that thing?" you ask.

"Let me show you!" Susan says. Without even asking you, she points it at you and pulls the trigger. You see the world expand around you. The shock of it all is too much for you. You're shrinking! Before Susan is even done, you pass out.

How small does she make you?
11.title: Susan's apartment

113.content:
You wake up and see Susan's huge face staring at you. She starts laughing and sticks out her finger to you. To your horror, the thickness of her fingernail is about thirty feet. You calculate that you must be about 1/10 of a millimeter tall.

"Oops, I didn't realize you would be too small to climb my fingernail," Susan says, "So why don't I do this?" She puts her fingernail at the end of the table you're standing on. It's about a hundred feet to the edge of it.

"How did you shrink me?" you ask, terrified.

"Get on my fingernail and I'll tell you," Susan tells you. You shake your head. "Get on my fingernail, tiny!" she commands. You oblige sheepishly and walk towards her finger. The force is incredible as Susan brings you to her face.

"What are you going to do?" you ask, shaking.

"I'm going to try something," she says.

What does Susan do with you?
113.title: Smaller than a millimeter

choices: Tries to find a way to communicate to you
Keeps playing with you on her breast
1131.content:
"We're going to my bedroom little one!" Susan announces. Being very careful to not let you fall off her finger, the massive Susan walks to her bed and lies down. Her fingernail, or the ground from your perspective, trembles considerably, but you manage to hold on. You figure that it's better that Susan know where you are, as being lost in the folds of her sheets at this size would be a nightmare. You watch from your perch as Susan begins to remove her clothing. First comes her shirt, which slides off just past your face. Next, she removes her pants, allowing you to get a good look at her panties. Looking up, you can see Susan's face looking at you through her gigantic cleavage.
"Like what you see?" she laughs, noticing you staring at her breasts. Not wanting to offend the giant woman, you nod. Susan laughs again as she brings you to her face. "Then that's where you'll go!"
Without warning, her finger lowers and begins to tilt. You slide off of her finger and land on pinkish ground. The air is warm and smells of floral perfume. It's kind of comforting, actually. Looking up, you see Susan's huge face smiling down at you.
"Where am I?" you mutter to yourself. As if to answer your question, there is a terrible earthquake that knocks you down. You hear Susan giggle. You look around more carefully and realize that you are standing on Susan's mountainous breast.
"How about that? Knocked you over!" Susan taunts, "I guess my boobs aren't exactly firm ground, though," She looks directly at you and starts to playfully blow gently on her breast, which, to you, feels like a hurricane. You get low to the warm, spongy ground to avoid being blown off of Susan. Suddenly, you notice movement a ways to your right. Susan's cold breath has caused her nipple to become erect. She sees that you see it and smiles at you.
"Susan!" you shout, hoping to somehow get her attention and ask just what's going on. But Susan can't hear your tiny voice from down on her chest. The giantess prods at the squishy ground around you with a titanic finger and you flinch, thinking she is going to squish you. You yell out again, and this time Susan hears you.
"What's up, teeny guy?" she coos, but she can't hear your reply.

What does she do?
1131.title: On Susan's Boobs

choices: "We can restore you to normal size for a while!"
11313.content: "Oh," Susan says, "You must be confused about what happened to you. Let me explain. This," She pulls out an odd grayish ray gun with blinking buttons, "Is a shrinking ray. I found it in a box on my doorstep a week ago or so. That was when I decided I wanted to make you small, cutie!" Susan giggles as she watches you. "And now that you know..."
11313.title: Susan's Shrink Ray

113131.content: "I can't have you going off somewhere and telling the world about this device," Susan explains, "And besides, I want you all to myself!" You cower as you hear Susan fiddling with the device's controls. Suddenly, a blast fires from the tip and hits you directly, enveloping you in a greenish glow. Instantly, Susan starts to grow larger and larger, the ground beneath you expanding rapidly. The massive woman starts to laugh, shaking her breasts and causing you to tumble around and fall. Her already huge pink nipple expands larger still, and her breast beneath you grows huger and huger by the second. At last, you stop. Susan smiles sexily and glances down at you on her chest, though you doubt she can see you at this point. She tells you you have shrunk to...
113131.title: Shrinking Again

choices: Susan begins to lick her nipple
1131312.content: "According to this handy little calculator on the shrink ray here, you're about 1/1000 of a millimeter tall. Neat, right? You're like a little, microscopic speck on my boob! I must seem so huge to you, my tiny man." Susan informs you. Her face, now just a huge, blurry landmark on the horizon, smiles down at you. You examine your surroundings and see that you are standing in one of the massive canyons formed by the ridges on Susan's nipple, each wall as high at the Grand Canyon's. She seems unfathomably large to you. All of a sudden, this woman has become your world. Suddenly, your world starts to shift as...
1131312.title: Microscopic on a boob

1133.content:
You shudder as Susan moves you down away from her face. As you are moving, you get a glimpse and see that she is laying down. Now wearing anything. This would be a good time to get a look at her large breasts, were then not several thousand times your size. Your fear reaches its peak when you see your destination: Susan's vagina. Fully expecting her to insert you into her thousand foot tall vagina, never to be seen again, you tense up and close your eyes. Susan doesn't put you into her vagina, however. Instead, you tumble off of her finger and into a forest of her unshaved pubic hair. Each is a tree trunk, stretching up hundreds of feet.

"Have fun down there, baby," Susan coos, "If I decide things need to get more interesting, I'll make 'em," Far off in the distance, you see Susan's huge fingers stroking her massive, gaping vagina and hear her moans of pleasure. You decide to start walking around the pube forest and exploring. It smells overwhelmingly of sex, and you can't help but notice the humidity. Finally, after a few minutes of walking, you come to the end of Susan's pubic hair. Just as you're about to leave, however, Susan stops you.

"You can't leave yet! Things haven't gotten interesting!" she protests. Still, you continue to walk towards the exit. "Fine," pouts Susan, "Let's see how easy it will be for you to get out of there now!" She pulls the trigger of the shrinking gun, and a beam fires from the tip of it and hits you. You start to dwindle in size again, and the exit get farther and farther away. You start to run, but Susan just adjusts the dials on the ray gun and you shrink even faster. Smaller and smaller you shrink, until eventually Susan lets up on the shrinking. You've shrunken to a ten-thousandth of a millimeter, at least, maybe less. You're so small now that you can't even see the end of Susan's pubic hair anymore. Each hair is just under a mile wide at the base.

"Now, I want you to look around down there, in my bush, tiny explorer," Susan commands, "Or things might get even more interesting. Understand?" You nod vigorously, not that she can see you.

What now?
1133.title: Shrinking in Susan's bush

choices: You wake up looking at Lin's sizable foot
Lin's face staring at you wakes you suddenly
You wake up in the dark...
Towering carpet strands greet you, but are dwarfed by Lin's gigantic legs
12.content:
"Hey, Steve!" You recognize the voice immediately as belonging to Lin, who lives a few doors down. "Do you know what yesterday's physics lesson was on? If you have your notes, do you want to come over and study?" It just dawns on you that Lin was absent from your physics class yesterday.
"Sure, Lin, just let me grab my notes and I'll be right over," you say, "By the way, why weren't you in class? Are you ok?" Lin wasn't the kind to miss class for no reason. She smiles and gets an odd gleam in her eye.
"I've been working on something cool. Oh, I just realized, I can show you when you come over!" Lin returns to her apartment as you go back home to retrieve your notes. On the way, you think it is strange that Lin is being so friendly to you. Not that she isn't normally sociable, but some days she won't even say hello to you. You quickly shake the thought however as you knock on Lin's door.
Lin opens the door promptly with one hand behind her back. You enter her apartment, which, unlike yours, is neat and free of clutter. As she shuts the door, you notice she is intentionally standing between you and the exit. At last, it gets too weird and you decide to speak up.
"What's going on, Lin?" you ask, to which Lin smiles a big, pretty grin.
"I'm going to show you my project!" she tells you, "And it's right here!" She pulls out a silver device with beeping lights and points it directly at you.
"Don't do anything you'll regret, Lin," you say as you back away. You're not sure what this device might do, but it could be a death ray or something, right? Lin giggles cutely before activating the machine with a high-pitched humming sound. A bright light surrounds you and you black out.
12.title: Lin's Invitation

choices: You awaken in a dark, moist place: Erin's mouth.
You come to at the feet of your gigantic friend.
You wake up in the palm of Erin's hand, with her smiling down at you.
Erin hasn't found you yet, but you wake up on the floor near to her.
14.content:
(This arc has Steve shrink to just 1/8th of an inch, so it's relatively large for a micro. Just a heads-up)

You heard a familiar voice call your name from behind you, and you knew who it was before you even turned around. There was no mistaking the sharp yet soft-spoken voice of your friend Erin. She was a bit of an introvert, and you definitely weren't used to her engaging you in public just out of the blue, but you weren't in any place to question your luck. She was incredibly cute, and more importantly a hell of a lot more approachable than more confident or cocky girls your age. Although you'd never thought you'd be into a chick with blue hair, Erin was somehow able to pull it off with stunning aplomb. Still helplessly stuck in your reverie, you turn and face the girl, grinning like a fool.

"Uh, Steve? You in there?" she inquired with a laugh, and you snapped back into reality as your goofy smile dissipated.
"Hey, Erin... 'sup?" was all you could muster under the circumstances, and you felt like hitting yourself with a very blunt object.
"Not too much. Hey, do you have time to sit down somewhere and talk? I have to talk to you about something."
You couldn't believe this was happening. First she approaches you out of nowhere, and now Erin wants to go somewhere alone to chat. It was your lucky day!

Even so, you weren't about to decline out of pessimism. "Sure! Uh, we could just go to my apartment real quick. It's only a minute or so from here."
She agreed, and after a brief walk you make it to your apartment. "Sorry about the mess, I haven't been her in a few days," you explain, turning to close the door.
"Oh, it's no big deal to me. You might find it a little inconvenient, though," Erin responded with a giggle.
You smile weakly, back still to her. "What do you mean?" you say with a confused laugh. "I don't get the--"

Your body was suddenly surged with an instantaneous tingling sensation, cutting you off mid-sentence. Although it was difficult to detect the source, you knew it had come from behind you. Had Erin done something? Your vision rapidly became blurred and sort of stretched, and the size and proportion of things began to appear skewed. Your look down at your hands, noticing they seem smaller than usual, and as you look back up you realize it's not just them. Everything around you seemed bigger, but it was you who was becoming smaller! Erin continued to laugh, but as the tingling continued it was feminine yet roaring. Your vision gave out at last, and you slipped into the inky blackness of unconsciousness.
14.title: Your (Un)Lucky Day

info.description:
This is a story about a 20 year old guy who gets shrunken to super small sizes by women. He is shrunken by a shrinking ray gun that can do some amazing things. For example, if he shrinks smaller than cells, he cannot see them, his surroundings just get bigger, etc. Have fun with it!

Rules:
No guy/guy stuff. Two girls is fine. No offense, this just isn't that kind of interactive.
No underage interaction.
No killing the main character.
Keep toilet stuff to a minimum. Again, this isn't that kind of thing.
Main character doesn't have to shrink to super small sizes, but nothing over 2 inches.
Females can grow, just keep it to a minimum. 10-15 feet is fine, just no giant rampages.
Minimal family stuff. Some is ok, but not a lot.
Have fun!
